text:
Make the Most of Summer with Special Offers at Four Seasons Hotel bahrain bay Published on : Friday, August 14, 2015
Whether looking for a fun-filled family escape or a relaxing couple’s retreat, Four Seasons Hotel Bahrain Bay is providing guests the perfect reason for a memorable holiday this summer with the offer of an additional complimentary night for every two consecutive paid nights booked.
For families, the urban resort’s luxurious accommodations offer expansive indoor living space. Endless adventures guide children’s days at the Kids For All Seasons Club, while baby-sitting services allow parents to indulge in time together, either sharing in rejuvenation at the 17 treatment room Spa or simply relaxing around the secluded jetty of the Saltwater Experience Pool.
Stay Longer in a Suite – Third Night Free
The Stay Longer in a Suite – Third Night Free offer is available for all suite stays until September 30, 2015, and allows guests to enjoy an additional complimentary night for every two consecutive paid nights booked. Effective October 1, 2015 this offer applies Saturday to Wednesday only. Guests must stay three nights minimum and the free night must be used in conjunction with the initial stay.
Ideal for family vacation or weekend couples retreat, the Stay Longer in a Suite offer is the ultimate choice to explore the very best of the capital city of Manama.
The Hotel continues to impress with 20 percent off the room rate when booking the Bahrain Getaway offer. Guests are invited to experience ancient souqs, the world-renowned National Theatre, or simply unwind in the Hotel’s expansive and natural light-filled Spa or luxurious suites and guest rooms for the perfect getaway. Rates starting from BHD 96 per night for stays of four to six nights.
Couples can escape to the tranquility of luxuriously equipped Super Cabanas around the adults-only Azure Pool, or enjoy a romantic walk down to the turquoise lagoon waters of the bay along the private island’s intimate paths framed by palm trees, plants and flowers. Complimentary use of the five invigorating swimming pools, a range of non-motorised watersports and cooking classes with Four Seasons chefs are all available leisure activities.
Source:-Four Seasons
